headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Pfister Comet S2
content: Look closely. Thereâ€™s something in the skies over Los Santos. A perfectly aerodynamic, exquisitely styled, 1,785kg streak of aluminum is plunging through the atmosphere, ready to level an extinction event at every other car in your collection. So prepare for impact. The Comet S2 is here. Available from Legendary Motorsport.
